title: RESOLVED: Config-driven composite score weights
description:
Composite score calculation is now config-driven for easy tuning.

## Config Structure
```python
CLASSIFICATION_CONFIG = {
    "composite_score_weights": {
        "z_roas": 0.5,   # Revenue efficiency most important
        "z_ctr": 0.3,    # Engagement signal
        "z_cpa": -0.2,   # Cost efficiency (negative = lower is better)
    },
    # ... other config
}
```

## Benefits
- Different weights per tenant possible
- A/B testing different scoring models
- Easy adjustment based on feedback

## Resolution
Config structure added to implementation plan. Weights are config-driven with sensible defaults matching production behavior.
